sys:positions.title: Minister of Industry, Commerce and Supplies

description: Ram Krishna Tamrakar is a Nepalese politician representing the Nepali Congress party. He was elected to the Pratinidhi Sabha in the 1999 election. Following his election, he was appointed Minister of Industry, Commerce and Supplies, and later served as the Minister of Health. Tamrakar is the Treasurer of the Nepali Congress. In 2005, he was arrested in connection with anti-royal protests.
short_description: Nepali politician who has served as Minister of Industry, Commerce and Supplies, and Minister of Health.
